pageTitle: Dar Credit and Capital IPO Date, Price, GMP, Details
pageHeading: Dar Credit and Capital Limited IPO (Dar Credit and Capital IPO) Detail

lotSize.summary: Investors can bid for a minimum of 2000 shares and in multiples thereof. The following table depicts the minimum and maximum investment by Retail Investors and HNI in terms of shares and amount.

promoterHolding.promoters: The Promoters of the company are Mr. Ramesh Kumar Vijay Mr. Rajkumar Vijay and Mrs. Rakshita Vijay.
promoterHolding.note: The value will be calculated using Equity Dilution = Share Holding Pre Issue - Share Holding Post Issue

about.details:
Incorporated in 1994, Dar Credit and Capital Limited is a Non-Banking Finance Company (NBFC) offering three primary types of financial products: (i) Personal Loans, (ii) Unsecured MSME Loans, and (iii) Secured MSME Loans.

The company offers credit solutions to low-income individuals, especially those in class-four employment roles like cleaners and peons in municipalities.

Additionally, DCCL extends credit to small-scale shopkeepers and vendors, strongly focusing on empowering women entrepreneurs.

As of December 31, the company had 24,608 Active Customers, who are served by our 27 branches and Camps across 64 districts in 6 states in India.

The company's loan portfolio was moderately diversified, comprising 44.46% personal loans to individuals, 40.12% micro loans, 2.65% unsecured SME loans, and 12.76% secured MSME loans.

Services:

  • Personal Loan to the employees of Municipalities
  • Unsecured MSME Loans
  • Secured MSME Loans

As of December 31, 2024, the company had 224 employees.

Competitive Strength:

  • Quick and Efficient Loan Processing along with flexible Lending Practices.
  • Strong Understanding of Local Markets.
  • Use technology to improve credit assessment, risk management, and customer service, allowing us to swiftly process applications and disburse loans.
  • Experienced and Qualified Management Team.

contactDetails.full_address: Dar Credit and Capital Limited, Business Tower 206, AJC Bose Road, 6 th Floor Unit No. 6B

faqs.question: What is the Dar Credit and Capital IPO?
faqs.answer:
Dar Credit and Capital IPO is a SME IPO of 4276000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹25.66 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹57 to ₹60 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on May 21, 2025, and closes on May 23, 2025.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Dar Credit and Capital IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Dar Credit and Capital IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Dar Credit and Capital IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Dar Credit and Capital IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Dar Credit and Capital IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Dar Credit and Capital IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Dar Credit and Capital IPO opens on May 21, 2025 and closes on May 23, 2025.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Dar Credit and Capital IPO?
faqs.answer: Dar Credit and Capital IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Dar Credit and Capital IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Dar Credit and Capital IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Dar Credit and Capital IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Dar Credit and Capital IPO will be done on Monday, May 26, 2025, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, May 27, 2025. Check the Dar Credit and Capital IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Dar Credit and Capital IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Dar Credit and Capital IPO listing date is not yet announced. The tentative date of Dar Credit and Capital IPO listing is Wednesday, May 28, 2025.
